description: Functions with parameter validation, type checking, and business rule validation

expected_output.runtime_behavior: Throws validation error if email format is invalid

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="setUserAge">
  <q:param name="age" type="number" required="true" validator="range(0,120)" />
  <q:return>
    UPDATE users SET age = {age}
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Validates age is in valid range before updating

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="registerUser">
  <q:param name="cpf" type="string" required="true" validator="cpf" />
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return>
    INSERT INTO users (cpf, name) VALUES ({cpf}, {name})
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Validates CPF format and checksum before insertion

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="addWebsite">
  <q:param name="url" type="string" required="true" validator="url" />
  <q:return>
    INSERT INTO websites (url) VALUES ({url})
  </q:return>
</q:function>

<q:function name="createAccount">
  <q:param name="username" type="string" required="true" validator="minLength(3),maxLength(20),alphanumeric" />
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="true" validator="email" />
  <q:return>
    INSERT INTO accounts (username, email) VALUES ({username}, {email})
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Applies multiple validation rules: length and format

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="setPassword">
  <q:param name="password" type="string" required="true" validator="minLength(8),hasUppercase,hasLowercase,hasNumber,hasSpecial" />
  <q:return>
    UPDATE users SET password_hash = HASH({password})
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Validates password complexity before hashing and storing

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="registerCompany">
  <q:param name="cnpj" type="string" required="true" validator="cnpj" />
  <q:param name="companyName" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return>
    INSERT INTO companies (cnpj, name) VALUES ({cnpj}, {companyName})
  </q:return>
</q:function>
